name: Hole alone
description:
Set in a future where Earth left a hole after being destroyed by unknown beings. Philip with his A.I dog named D must embark on a journey to find those responsible. 

I was inspired by missed messages so I got into visual novel.  Although light years away from being that amazing... This is a short calm point and click adventure game. It is set to have at least 3 different endings that depends on the choices you make in game.  

P.S. This is a work in progress. The plot is done. I just didn't have time to complete it. There are about 2 working scenes here. It stops at intro of spaceport scene 3. I have 12 scenes. I'm hoping to finish this by next week when work and life doesn't bother. Thank you for playing. Have a wonderful day. 

Credits: Art by me,  Texture from unsplash, Sound from freesound.com, Unity game engine and adventure creator
